text: @NYGovCuomo @CovidActNow Imagine how much better things would be if you didn’t issue that ill conceived and reckless decision to place COVID-19 positive patients in nursing homes among our most vunerable.  Have the honesty and integrity to admit your mistake and apologize.   This is not going away
